name: Ball Brawl!
description:
The most amusing soccer game ever!

There is no foul or red card!

Slide tackle your opponents, grab the ball and watch them fly away!

Tackle everyone in your sight, dribble, shoot and score a goal!

Beat your opponents and become the champion!
publishers: Panteon Yazilim Oyun Egitim Teknolojileri ve Hizmetleri San. Tic. Ltd. Sirketi
